content:
From: Laurent Th√©ry <Laurent.Thery@sophia.inria.fr>
Here is the result of the vote:

Out of 56 voters
18 had option A (merge with IJCAR) as first choice
27 had option B (merge with ALC2) as first choice
11 had option C (separate) as first choice

at this point, the 11 votes were transferred, so the final result is
option A: 21
option B: 32

TPHOLs will merge with ACL2 in 2010 for FLoC.

Regards,
